i
and ubu as far as I can tell.  The total length is 27.2=94. Originally it=
 was
very wide since the nakago is 5/16=94 at the widest. The blade has bee=
n
through many polishes and is now narrows to 3/16=94 (sorry but I will pro=
bably
never convert to metric). What is visible of the hamon is very narrow=
 suguha
(1/8=94) and no turnback on the boshi. The size and length did both=
er me since

at it is,
hence my curiosity about any additional information on the smith.=
